content: the spiked dishcloth a unique crochet cotton dishcloth pattern that s both stylish and functional measuring a handy 8 x 8 this dishcloth is the perfect size for all your kitchen needs a video tutorial for this pattern is available https //youtu be/fvitplgf2ow materials needed 80 yards of a #4 medium-weight cotton yarn 4 5mm crochet hook > subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be notified when new patterns come out 1 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe a potholder pattern to match this dishcloth is now available https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/spiked-potholder
